name: YouCanBookMe to KlickTipp Integration
description:
This integration template connects YouCanBookMe with KlickTipp to help you streamline appointment scheduling and automate your email communication. As soon as a new booking is made via YouCanBookMe, the contact data is automatically transferred to KlickTipp. A new contact is created and can immediately be added to your email automation.

This is especially useful for coaches, consultants, trainers, freelancers, and digital experts who use YouCanBookMe to book strategy calls, consultations, or discovery sessions. With this integration, you ensure that every new booking is followed by a timely and relevant email—whether it’s a confirmation, reminder, preparation material, or follow-up offer.

Booking details such as name, email address, appointment date, and custom questions can be mapped directly into KlickTipp fields. This allows you to personalize your email sequences and automate your customer journey from the very first interaction.

The setup is simple and does not require coding. Save time, avoid missed opportunities, and deliver a seamless client experience by integrating your booking flow directly into KlickTipp.

Resources:
https://www.klicktipp.com/support/knowledge-base/youcanbookme/
